com.jidesoft.swing
Class HeaderBox

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.AbstractButton
                  javax.swing.JButton
                      com.jidesoft.swing.HeaderBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class HeaderBox
extends javax.swing.JButton

HeaderBox is a special component that is used in JIDE Pivot Grid product to mimic a button with table header style.

See Also:
Serialized Form
